评论详情: This shirt is such a nice find! It has a baggy fit without feeling oversized, which is exactly what I was looking for. The bright color matches the pictures perfectly and really pops. The material is comfy—lightweight and breathable, but not thin or flimsy. My only small issue is the neckline, which is a little scrunched up, but it’s still cute and doesn’t take away from how much I like it. Overall, it fits well and feels great to wear!

My daughter loves this shirt, wearing it with just about anything. It looks nice and has held up well. I usually put it in a garment bag and do not dry it. I forgot and let it go through the dryer recently and some of the vinyl lettering cracked. But this is many washes in… I would buy it again. She is 5 foot three and 140 pounds and would normally wear an adult medium. We got this in a small and is a loose fit, hitting just above her hips. Recommended!
It’s cool, it’s wide fit. Feels good but can snag easily so careful not to rub up on rough surfaces etc.
Soo cutee 😍 💓 great fit and color and quality are wonderful
One of my favorite shirts because it’s kinda oversized and breathable texture
Super comfortable and such a nice texture! Love this brand and definitely will be buying more from them again 10/10 recommend

Love the feel of this jersey except it  had runs in it! I tried putting clear nail polish on the back to stop it from getting bigger but unfortunately it bled through the front im so sad because i truly love this jersey so much but i guess ill either return it or just really be careful when wearing. For how expensive it is I didn’t expect it to tear
This shirt has become a favorite shirt for my teenage daughter.  It's big and the style really looks good.  Nice quality shirt.
This shirt was on my daughters birthday Wish list. Fast delivery, well packaged, she is happy.
nothing to complain about, love the shirt!

This review is for the navy blue shirt. I’ve purchased a couple of these in various colors as well as the pants. I was disappointed when I received the blue one which I paid for a new shirt but received a used shirt that even has the other persons name on the zip bag that it comes in. The shirt looks good but as I stated this was disappointing.

I will admit, I was a little worried that it wouldn’t be the quality it was in the pictures, despite looking at the reviews. However, after it arrived in the mail and I opened it up, I was immediately surprised at how nice the quality of it was. The graphics on the shirt were very nice, and have yet to peel or flake. It’s lightweight, so don’t expect something heavy or thick. If you’re looking for a cute trendy shirt or even a streetwear style shirt, this is the one for you. You can style it in so many ways. I will definitely be buying more shirts from this seller, and highly recommend them to any friend I have.
So cute, only down side is makes me look like a quarterback, because I have wide shoulders. But it’s so cute
The quality of this shirt is amazing! The fabric is lightweight and breathable, perfect for summer, and the design is sick! easy to wash too!

When I saw this, my boys said to snatch this up because this was a Iconic shirt maker in the day. I got the XL, it was big, but I wanted to use it to lounge around in, even though my boys are mortified that I wouldn't just box it up for it's authentic value someday.  But I'm old school, and we wore our stuff, and still kept them in great shape. It's a mesh material, so it won't be hot to wear in the warmer months.  I liked it and will definitely be sporting the memories of the 90s.

My teenage son likes this brand of clothing a lot and we first found it on Amazon Vine. He wants any item of clothing that appears from them, and this shirt was no exception.  It has an interesting collar, he says that the material is comfortable, and it fits true to size. We haven't washed it yet but I will update if anything goes wrong after washing.
although this shirt fits oversized, it doesn’t feel heavy on me which is the best thing about the quality. i also love the design as the neck part is constructed differently and isn’t big.
